params.currentTime: Timestamp of the failed rewrap attempt
params.resurrectionTime: Resurrection timestamp which has already passed
The resurrection time defined during the sarcophagus creation or rewrap

params.maximumPermissibleResurrectionTime: Resurrection timestamp which is too far in the future
params.resurrectionTime: Resurrection timestamp which is too far in the future
params.sarcophagusMaximumRewrapInterval: Maximum rewrap interval set for the sarcophagus

params.sarcoId: Id that is already in use

params.creationDeadline: Deadline for creation of a sarcophagus with the supplied parameters
params.creationTime: Time when the sarcophagus parameters were created
params.currentTime: Timestamp of the failed create attempt

params.sarcoId: Id of sarcophagus that was buried

params.arweaveTxId: arweave tx id for the sarcophagus
params.creationTime: Creation time as set during negotiation, not the same as blocktime at which event is emitted
params.cursedArchaeologists: Array of addresses of cursed archaeologists
params.name: Name of the new sarcophagus
params.resurrectionTime: Resurrection time of the new sarcophagus
params.totalDiggingFees: Total digging fees charged to embalmer to create the sarcophagus

params.resurrectionTime: New resurrection time for the sarcophagus
params.rewrapSarcophagusProtocolFees: Total protocol fees charged to the embalmer for the rewrap
params.sarcoId: Id of sarcophagus that was rewrapped
params.totalDiggingFees: Total digging fees charged to the embalmer for the rewrap

params.arweaveTxId: id of tx storing the sarcophagus payload on arweave
params.sarcophagusParams: params to set on sarcophagus being created
params.selectedArchaeologists: the archaeologists the embalmer has selected to curse

ArchaeologistListContainsDuplicate(addre.notice: Emitted when an embalmer attempts to create a sarcophagus with an archaeologist list that contains the same archaeologist more than once

DuplicatePublicKey(bytes).notice: Emitted when an embalmer attempts to create a sarcophagus with a public key that has already been assigned to another sarcophagus

NoArchaeologistsProvided().notice: Emitted when an embalmer attempts to create a sarcophagus with no archaeologists

ResurrectionTimeInPast(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when an embalmer attempts to rewrap a sarcophagus with a resurrection time that has already passed

ResurrectionTimePastMaxResurrectionTime(.notice: Emitted when the resurrection time defined during sarcohpagus creation or rewrap goes past the max resurrection time

ResurrectionTimeTooFarInFuture(uint256,u.notice: Emitted when an embalmer attempts to rewrap a sarcophagus with a resurrection time that exceeds the maximum rewrap interval

SarcophagusAlreadyExists(bytes32).notice: Emitted when an embalmer attempts to create a sarcophagus with an id that is already in use

SarcophagusParametersExpired(uint256,uin.notice: Emitted when an embalmer attempts to create a sarcophagus with expired parameters

ThresholdCannotBeZero().notice: Emitted when an embalmer attempts to create a sarcophagus with a shamir secret sharing threshold of 0

ThresholdGreaterThanTotalNumberOfArchaeo.notice: Emitted when an embalmer attempts to create a sarcophagus with more required archaeologists than total archaeologists

BurySarcophagus(bytes32).notice: Emitted when a sarcophagus is buried

CreateSarcophagus(bytes32,string,uint256.notice: Emitted when a sarcophagus is created

RewrapSarcophagus(bytes32,uint256,uint25.notice: Emitted when a sarcophagus is rewrapped

burySarcophagus(bytes32).notice: Terminates a sarcophagus by setting its resurrection time to infinity and returning locked bonds to all innocent cursed archaeologists. Callable by the embalmer of a sarcophagus if its resurrection time has not passed, it has not been compromised by k or more accusals, and it has not been buried.

createSarcophagus(bytes32,(string,uint25.notice: Creates a sarcophagus with the supplied parameters and locks a portion of each archaeologist's freeBond equal to the digging fees calculated for the duration of the sarcophagus until its resurrection time. Verifies that each supplied archaeologist has signed off on the sarcophagus negotiation parameters:    - `publicKey` that matches the private key the archaeologist is responsible for    - `maximumRewrapInterval` to be enforced for the lifetime of the sarcophagus. No new resurrection time for future rewraps may exceed this interval from time of rewrap.    - `creationTime` of sarcophagus    - `diggingFeePerSecond` agreed to be paid to the archaeologist during the lifetime of the sarcophagus. Paid per rewrap and publishPrivateKey. Constant.    - `curseFee` agreed to be paid to the archaeologist once during the lifetime of the sarcophagus to cover cost of publishPrivateKey tx. Paid either on first rewrap or publishPrivateKey if no rewrap has occurred Constant.

rewrapSarcophagus(bytes32,uint256).notice: Updates the resurrectionTime on a sarcophagus. Callable by the embalmer of a sarcophagus if its resurrection time has not passed, it has not been compromised by k or more accusals, and it has not been buried.
